name: Boba Dash
description:
Created By: Michelle Wang, Olivia Rose Cox for UCI GDIM 31 Summer Session class

Boba Dash is a cute infinite runner game that combines sweetness and adventure centered around the popular milk tea drink. As a milk tea, the player can expect to avoid obstacles while trying to collect boba coins, points represented through fruit add-ons, and other topping-themed powerups to try and be the sweetest and best boba drink possible. 

Special Thanks: Chris Cox
